question: To protest against which of the following bills, Bhagat Singh and Batukeswar Dutt threw bomb into the Central Assembly?Â
explanation: On 8th April 1929, Bhagat Singh and Batukeswar Dutt threw a bomb into the Central Assembly. After the bombing, they threw leaflets into the hall. It was mentioned in the leaflets that they are opposing the Trade Disputes and the Public Safety Bill. They also condemned the killing of Lala Lajpat Roy.
